product_summary: Prodvana is an intelligent deployment platform that helps organizations deploy software faster and with fewer issues. It uses intent-based deployments to automatically calculate release paths, which reduces the time and effort required to deploy software. Prodvana also includes a number of features to help organizations increase reliability, move faster, and debug faster.
product_pros: Deploy software faster with fewer issues
Reduce the time and effort required to deploy software
Debug faster with intelligence from Clairvoyance
product_cons: Can be complex to set up and configure
May not be suitable for all organizations
May not be as flexible as some other deployment tools
May not be as well-supported as some other deployment tools

product_usecases.details: Prodvana can be used to deploy microservices in a variety of environments, including Kubernetes, ECS, and serverless providers.
Prodvana includes built-in release strategies to handle updating stateful systems like databases, storage systems, and event buses.
Prodvana can be used to deploy tenancy-based architectures, which allow multiple tenants to share the same infrastructure.
Prodvana can be used to automate the provisioning of infrastructure, including servers, storage, and networks.
Prodvana can be used to manage CI/CD pipelines, including building, testing, and deploying software.

product_toolfor.details: Prodvana can help developers deploy software faster and with fewer issues.
Prodvana can help operations teams automate infrastructure provisioning and management.
Prodvana can help DevOps teams manage CI/CD pipelines and improve software delivery.
Prodvana offers a Startup plan with a 30-day free trial.
Prodvana offers an Enterprise plan with unlimited features and support.

product_pricing: Prodvana offers three pricing plans: Startup, Teams, and Enterprise. The Startup plan starts at $500/month and includes 3 users and 1 runtime. The Teams plan starts at $2500/month and includes 10 users and 3 runtimes. The Enterprise plan is priced on a case-by-case basis and includes unlimited users and runtimes.
